Detailed Description

A special kind of plExternalFunction defined by dynamically compiling source code provided by the user.

The advantage over normal plExternalFunction objects is that instances of this class are guaranteed to be serializable.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

plExternalFunctionFromSource::plExternalFunctionFromSource ( const plExternalFunction &  other)
explicit

Promote from a plExternalFunction.

If the object being copied is actually of the wrong type, an exception is raised.

Member Function Documentation
